definition[0]: gradually increasing – often used about things that cause problems or trouble
example[0]: There was mounting pressure on him to resign.
example[1]: The government has come under mounting criticism in the press.
example[3]: There’s mounting evidence of a link between obesity and some forms of cancer.
definition[1]: an object to which other things, especially parts of a machine, are fastened to keep them in place
example[4]: The engine is supported by four rubberized mountings.
